Text: REBirdman give me a call at the office if you can Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday October AM To Christopher M Bedford Subject RE Whats up I will be coming in town the weekend of Nov st Nov th I hope you dont have plans for that Saturday Ill find out today if I can get him for the whole day to If things workout I would like to take him to Vero for the day So I was thinking you could go with me to pick him up and we could spend the day and night in Vero Let me know what you think My sister will probably also come just for the day As soon as I find out Ill let you know Anyway how are things down there Last weekend I went to Austin for the UT and Colorado game Austin is an awesome place Joe Original Message From Christopher M Bedford ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject Bird where you in town this weekend I talked to your sister for a little while and she said you might be coming into town The Astros are good Whats going on with Peyton I am sure Tonya is being reasonable again Christopher M Bedford Sr Agency Field Specialist Cell mailto File mailto This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Bird where you in town this weekend I talked to your sister for a little while and she said you might be coming into town The Astros are good Whats going on with Peyton I am sure Tonya is being reasonable again Christopher M Bedford Sr Agency Field Specialist Cell mailto

RENot a big deal I will call mom and let her know I am trying to take Friday off if it is possible I have several app but I am trying to reschedule Just give me a call on the cell phone I am leaving right now Talk to you later Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October PM To Christopher M Bedford Subject RE Hey Tell your mom Ill call her this weekend I plan on being at your moms house the whole day I dont want to imposebut Im sure she wont mind I dont have to go to the dentist on Friday so Im free the whole day lets do something Ill call you on sat go noles Joe Original Message From Christopher M Bedford ENRON Sent Friday October AM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject RE Any more news on next week Are you still flying in at pm I want to let mom know a little in advance if you want to go to Vero I cannot believe Larry Dierker resigned although he probably would have been fired anyway This Saturday is full of great games and of couse I have to work until ridiculous Later Original REI did talk to my mom and she said no problem She will probably be there if not I will give you the key to the house I told my mom you would give her a call and let her know for sure she definately wants to see Peyton Just give me a call when you get a chanse Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October AM To Christopher M Bedford Subject RE Good Luck Ill be staying at my parents condo Did you talk to your mom Original Message From Christopher M Bedford ENRON Sent Wednesday October AM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject Bird everything still on for this weekend I am in Winter Haven right now I have a big interview this morning at Just give me a call later I think I have Friday off Christopher M Bedford Sr Agency Field Specialist Cell mailto File mailto This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE birdmanI will send the card to your sister Good call Sam on asking that question over email Later Chris Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday June PM To Christopher M Bedford Subject RE birdman not on this emailnothing really just waiting for the test address Jolyn Stepenovitch oak harbour drive juno beach fl Original Message From Christopher M Bedford ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESChristopherMBedfordCchristopherEmEbedfordEgtrstatefarmEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject RE birdman Nothing whats going on with Tanya the kid Stros Rule Original Message From mailto File mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Christopher M Bedford Subject RE birdman ILL GET IT TODAY Whats going on Original Message From Christopher M Bedford ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESChristopherMBedfordCchristopherEmEbedfordEgtrstatefarmEcomE NRONcom File mailtoIMCEANOTESChristopherMBedfordCchristopherEmEbedfordEgtrstatefarmEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Stepenovitch Joe Subject birdman Birdman I need your sisters address so I can send her a thnak you card I know shes porbably used to me staying at the Breakers but I still want to send the card Later Christopher M Bedford Agency Field Specialist Cell mailto File mailto File mailto File mailto
